sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const NavScroller = () => { const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { async function fetchCategory() { await axios .get("http://localhost:8080/api/category/get-all") .then((res) => { setCategories(res.data.category); }); } fetchCategory(); }, []); return ( <>
World Apps Technology How-To Tec Business Politics Opinion Science Health News Travel
); }; export default NavScroller;
